item.title: MIUI V12.5.7.0.RJHCNXM Recovery update for Redmi 10X 5G China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi 10X 5G China

Codename: atom

Version: V12.5.7.0.RJHCNXM | 11.0

Size: 3.2 GB

MD5: 7eeb1dd5d5495f3f5e48a45d5ad07693

Changelog:
[MIUI12.5 Enhanced]
Swift performance. More life between the charges.
Focused algorithms: Our new algorithms will dynamically allocate system resources based on specific scenes, ensuring smooth experience on all models.
Atomized memory: Ultra-fine memory management mechanism will make RAM usage more efficient.
Smart balance: Core system improvements allow your device to make the best of the flagship hardware specs.
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2021. Increased system security.

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

item.title: MIUI V12.0.1.0.RJHCNXM Recovery update for Redmi 10X 5G China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi 10X 5G China

Codename: atom

Version: V12.0.1.0.RJHCNXM | 11.0

Size: 2.8 GB

MD5: c7a2e6c076f6953becce35b6774cbce1

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to April 2021. Increased system security.
[Control center]
New: An option that allows you to restrict opening Control center while on the Lock screen
[Status bar, Notification shade]
New: An option to switch between connected devices in the notification about media playback
GPS toggle renames as "Location"

Download: Here
